name: SSF1
title: CS Site-Specific Factor 1
subtitle: Invasion Beyond Capsule
notes:
**Note 1**:  Information about invasion beyond the capsule is collected in CS Extension as an element in anatomic staging.  It is also collected in this field as it may have an independent effect on prognosis.

**Note 2**:  Record the location of invasion beyond capsule as documented in the pathology report. Assign code 000 if surgical resection of the primary site is performed, the pathology report is available for review, and invasion beyond capsule is not mentioned.
rows: Invasion beyond capsule not present/not identified

Medial invasion:    
   Renal sinus      
   Perisinus fat

020 + 010
 
Medial invasion plus lateral invasion 
Renal sinus/perisinus fat invasion plus perinephric fat invasion

OBSOLETE DATA CONVERTED V0200   
See code 988  

Not applicable for this site

Not applicable:  Information not collected for this case
(May include cases converted from code 888 used in CSv1 for "Not applicable" or when the item was not collected.  If this item is required to derive T, N, M, or any stage, use of code 988 may result in an error.)
No surgical resection of primary site

Unknown or no information 
Not documented in patient record
